thread.title: SnoopWall Named One of the 20 Fastest Growing Security Companies for 2015
thread.title_full: SnoopWall Named One of the 20 Fastest Growing Security Companies for 2015

author: admin
title: SnoopWall Named One of the 20 Fastest Growing Security Companies for 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 4:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: SnoopWall, Inc. 
NASHUA, NH -- (Marketwired) -- 10/19/15 -- SnoopWall, Inc. ( www.snoopwall.com ), the world's first counterveillance security company, on the heels of being named the Top Ranked Mobile Device Security company by the CyberSecurity 500 has been named one of the SR 20 Fastest Growing Security Companies, by the prestigious silicon valley publication, The Silicon Review. 
"This award is given to a select group of cyber and physical security companies each year based upon customer adoption and growth metrics. We're pleased to include SnoopWall, a fast growing and innovative network and mobile security company," said Editorial Team of The Silicon Review. 
Source: http://thesiliconreview.com/magazines/sr-20-fastest-growing-security-companies/ 
"We're thrilled to be named one of the SR 20 for 2015. With our NetSHIELD appliances, we're able to solve the biggest problems in cyber security for a fraction of the cost of competition. With our MobileSHIELD endpoint agent we've solved the BYOD dilemma -- which is the second biggest problem in cyber security. Finally with our AppSHIELD SDK, we're solving the third biggest problem in cyber security by protecting mobile banking, wallet and retail apps on smartphones from losing consumer information (PII) to cyber criminals. We've taken on the three biggest challenges in cyber security and the market is very receptive, as we continue to grow through SMB channels throughout the globe," said Gary S. Miliefsky, CEO, SnoopWall, Inc. 
Source: http://thesiliconreview.com/magazines/next-generation-intrusion-prevention-from-the-inside-out-beyond-and-behind-the-firewall-snoopwall/ 
About SnoopWall SnoopWall is the world's first counterveillance security company delivering a suite of network, mobile and app security products as well as cloud-based services protecting all computing devices from prying eyes and new threats through patented cloaking technology. SnoopWall secures mission critical and highly valuable confidential information behind firewalls and on mobile devices with next generation technology that detects and blocks all remote control, eavesdropping and spying. SnoopWall's software products and hardware appliances are all proudly made in the U.S.A. Visit us at http://www.snoopwall.com and follow us on Twitter: @SnoopWallSecure. 
Learn more about our cybersecurity expert CEO at http://www.snoopwall.com/media/ Contact: 
For CEO interviews and Press Inquiries Contact: Brittany Thomas
